title: Favourite URF champion and why?
body:
What's your favourite URF champion, build and why do you enjoy being able to pick it?

I'll start,
URF RAMROD POPPY {{champion:78}} 
build lethality/movespeed, max e
run at people at ridiculous movespeed and then start spamming e and q, if you pin an enemy to a wall, you have them stunlocked, and if there is no wall, you spam e and run at them, until they hit a wall or die.
Not to mention it's hilarious watching poppy combo spam dash at people, and it doesn't have much counterplay.

replies.body:
Full AP Nami!

AP Nami just isn't that great in any sort of regular game. Her cooldowns are long, and she just doesn't have the burst that mages do. In URF though, the bounces are just so much fun.

Unfortunately, because it's regular URF and it's not one of the OP picks, rather increases the chances of losing which is disappointing.

I am a large fan of AP Miss Fortune at the moment, building a Rylai on her is good fun!

Along with that, I have been playing a lot of Neeko, Akali and Lethality Jinx.

If you are looking for something extremely strong I heavily suggest having a look into full AP Shyvana along with Qiyana, both seem to be quite strong this time around and are good fun if you wanna deal massive unexpected damage!

{{sticker:poppy-wink}}
Twitch. Nothing quite like building hurricane, three IEs, and one-shotting entire teams from stealth.

definitely would have to be wu-kong {{champion:62}}  ! build him full leathality  and maybe {{item:3053}} and {{item:3813}}  you can nealy one hit anyone and you clone makes for easy get aways <3

I've been personally enjoying Lethality Quinn and Valor most. Just something about being able to dash off enemies all the time.
